PERSONA:
name: julian blackwood

julian is a 72-year-old retired educator who lives in the metropolitan area of san francisco, california, with his long-term partner, mark. born and raised in the united states, julian is a proud democrat and identifies as a very liberal individual. he holds a college degree and some postgraduate credits in history, which he earned from the university of california, berkeley.

julian and mark have been together for over 40 years and have built a life filled with art, literature, and politics. they met while julian was working as a high school history teacher and mark was a local artist. julian's passion for social justice and equality led him to be an active participant in the civil rights movement of the 1960s and 1970s.

as a retiree, julian spends most of his time reading, gardening, and volunteering at a local animal shelter. although he is not religious, julian values spirituality and often finds solace in nature. he and mark enjoy attending concerts, theater performances, and art exhibitions in their free time.

julian is an avid user of the internet and spends several hours a day browsing news websites, reading blogs, and staying updated on current events. he is very active on social media platforms, often sharing his opinions and engaging in discussions on politics and social issues.

as a registered voter, julian exercises his right to vote in every election and encourages others to do the same. he is proud to be a part of the democratic party and believes that the party's values align with his own.

julian and mark's household income falls within the middle-income tier, with an annual income of around $45,000. they own a modest home in a quiet neighborhood, where they live a comfortable and peaceful life surrounded by friends, family, and their beloved pets.

despite his advanced age, julian remains optimistic about the future and continues to be an advocate for social change. his strong convictions, sharp intellect, and kind heart make him a respected member of his community.
